sentences.sentence: Indifference towards the sacrament of marriage appears strongest among the elderly, not the feckless young.
sentences.translation: 对婚姻的神圣性最为不在乎的并非是多变的年轻人，而是年老的一代。

sentences.sentence: Such is the origin of the legal consecration of the establishment of the Benedictines of the Perpetual Adoration of the Holy Sacrament at Paris.
sentences.translation: 这就是本笃会修女们在巴黎建立圣体永敬会的起源和法律根据。
